kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Run Keyword

kw.name: Open Workbook
kw.doc: Open an existing Excel workbook.

kw.doc: Read the content of a worksheet into a list of dictionaries.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
